DOC.brief_title: Study Prasugrel Korean Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Are overtly healthy male , determine medical history physical examination . Are age 20 45 year , inclusive . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 kg/m^2 27 kg/m^2 , inclusive , screening . Are currently enrol , discontinue within last 60 day clinical trial involve investigational drug device , concurrently enrol type medical research judge scientifically medically compatible study . Have know allergy prasugrel related compound . Are person previously complete withdrawn study study investigate prasugrel . Selfreported history significant bleeding trauma ( example , prolong bleed tooth extraction ) . History major surgery within 3 month screen plan surgery within 14 day last day dose . Have platelet count < 100,000/ ( cubic millimeter ) mm^3 time screening . Have test positive fecal occult blood screening . Have significant prolongation prothrombin time ( PT ) activate partial thromboplastin time ( APTT ) screening . Have clinically significant abnormality follow investigator 's review physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) clinical ( safety ) laboratory test screen . Personal firstdegree family history coagulation bleed disorder ( , hematemesis , melena , severe recurrent epistaxis , hemoptysis , gastrointestinal ulcer , hemorrhage , clinically overt hematuria intracranial hemorrhage ) reasonable suspicion vascular malformation , example , cerebral hemorrhage , aneurysm premature stroke ( cerebrovascular accident [ CVA ] < 65 year age ) . Have significant active hematological disease and/or whole blood donation 400 mL within last 2 month component blood donation within last month . Volunteers average weekly alcohol intake exceed 21 unit per week volunteer unwilling adhere study alcohol restriction study ( 1 unit = 360 mL beer ; 150 mL wine ; 45 mL distil spirit ) .
